name: Sergeant Boomerang-Demo
description:
Sgt. Boomerang is a top down shoot that you pack your guns and grenades on a boomerang and eliminate your enemies on the fly!

This game is still in development. The current demo demonstrates the game play. Many things are due to change including the story.

Thank you for playing the demo. Your opinion matters! To support or contribute to this game please use the discussion forum.
